[{"id":"JT-39716","entityId":"25-1420485","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"39716"},{"name":"summary","value":"Requirements: requires setup badge is shown on wf tab when rule requiring setup is deactivated"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR:
  • Attach a WF with some requirements to project.
  • Check out project WF tab.
  • Deactivate the rule with non-applied quick fixes.
ER:
Quick fixes are still suggested.
AR:
Only 'requires setup' tag is shown, without suggestions. This is quite misleading, as I can't check a problem out until I activate the rule.
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1485344303133"},{"name":"updated","value":"1524771868000"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Alexander.Volfman"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Alexander Volfman"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"mary"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Mariya Davydova"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-39715","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-847","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Andrey.Skladchikov","fullName":"Andrey Skladchikov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Workflow"],"valueId":["Workflow"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Usability Problem"],"valueId":["Usability Problem"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 65","id":"YouTrack:sprint 65"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2840450","author":"Andrey.Skladchikov","authorFullName":"Andrey Skladchikov","issueId":"JT-39716","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Anna Zhdan

The request to api/admin/projects/0-0/workflowRules?fields=rule(id,name,title,html,workflow(id,name)),isBroken,problems(id,message,fixes,areFixesApplied) doesn't return inactive rules. Was it intention or bug (doesn't look consistent for me)?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524657639304,"updated":1524657650689,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2840731","author":"Anna.Zhdan","authorFullName":"Anna Zhdan","issueId":"JT-39716","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Andrey Skladchikov I think it's a bug, i'll fix it
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524663762948,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2840897","author":"Alexander.Volfman","authorFullName":"Alexander Volfman","issueId":"JT-39716","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Mariya Davydova I find it strange that when a rule is deactivated (not attached), there's still requires setup tag shown. Don't you think this should be changed?
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524668307424,"updated":1524668340911,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2843463","author":"mary","authorFullName":"Mariya Davydova","issueId":"JT-39716","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Alexander Volfman Now, when you point this out, I agree, that this makes sense. It was very annoying when I filed this issue, mostly because of inconsistency. If we remove the tag, it will be fine.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1524762439092,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2843607","author":"Alexander.Volfman","authorFullName":"Alexander Volfman","issueId":"JT-39716","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Mariya Davydova thanks, rephrased the summary.
Andrey Skladchikov please consider the updates.
